title: [Vigil's End, Legion Lane]
description: Behind a verdant veil of untamed cattails, a slender, gently babbling streamlet wends alongside the path.  Tawny silt runoff bleeds into the gaps between stepping stones and dapples the pitted rock with clay-infused puddles.  The wild grasses have been hacked away, clearing a sopping track to a circular bark-shingled hut with a thatched river reed dome.  Twin torches burn on either side of the gashed sailcloth curtain covering the doorway.
